Eden_Prairie.Soak City (Valleyfair):
Soak City is a water park in Shakopee, Minnesota, United States, within the Valleyfair amusement park, and owned by Cedar Fair Entertainment Company It is included with the price of admission to the park.


== History ==
The Panic Falls slide complex, built in 1983, was the original part of the park. Originally the area of water rides was called 'Liquid Lightning', but as more were added, the name was changed to Whitewater Country Waterpark in 1992.
